New Records: Rohit Sharma scored a century in 70 balls, breaking Kapil Dev's record for the fastest World Cup century
Key Match Events: Rohit Sharma and Ishan Kishan put on a 156-run opening partnership
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma expressed that he didn't want to focus on the records that fell during his innings
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Arun Jaitley Stadium in Delhi
Others: The match was a part of the ICC Cricket World Cup 2023
